enabled.description: Indicates if the MSAL Exchange is enabled.

exchangePath.description: The new path your React SPA will call with the Microsoft token.

logoutPath.description: The logout path can remain the same.

cookieDomain.description: The domain to use for the session cookie.

cookiePath.description: The path to use for the session cookie.

cookieSecure.description: If the session cookie should be marked as secure (requires HTTPS).

sessionTimeout.description:
Session timeout in seconds. This is the time after which the session will expire.
Default is 3600 seconds (1 hour).

rememberMeTimeout.description:
Remember me timeout in seconds. This is the time after which the session will expire
if rememberMe is set true during login. Default is 604800 seconds (7 days).
